page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW PAISLEY/GLW.
page.content: This area comprises part of Paisley,a green belt on part of which private and SSHA housing is built and the outskirts of Glasgow. The area is about 60% rural and 40% urban{ {HOSPITALS}Hawkhead,Dykebar,Leverndale. {CHURCHES} 1 Church of Scotland,1 Catholic,and 4 others. {SCHOOLS } 1 Secondary, 2 Special, 6 Primary. {RAILWAYS} 5 railway lines run through the area.2 have been dismantled. {POLICE STATIONS}1 at Mill Street. {FACTORIES} 1Chemical,1Food,2Engineering {SPORTS GROUNDS} 2 {GOLF COURSES}2 {RESERVOIRS}1 {BUS SERVICES}There are many bus services linking the area with the centre of Paisley and Glasgow.
